snippet.title: City Tales - New Gameplay Trailer | FGS Live From GDC
snippet.description:
A gameplay trailer for City Tales - Medieval Era, a city builder where players manage resources, plan vibrant districts in accordance with their citizens' needs, and grow a thriving medieval settlement. It's coming to PC in 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #citytales #gdc

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
